Python Module Index

i | m | p | v
 
i
initial_conditions (GNU Linux) This module contains all the possible initial conditions for the program. Those are: Simple cubic, Fcc and Bcc. It returns an numpy array with the x, y, z coordinates of the positions of the particles.
initial_velocities (GNU Linux) Initial velocities distributions.
 
m
md
 
p
plotter (GNU Linux) This module contains a Class names Plotter that plots the outputs of the program, like energy vs time, in real time.
pymd (GNU Linux) Python interface for a C code to run efficient MD simulations.
 
v
velocities
